dataset.copyrightStatement:
Ocean current map (non Quality Controlled) - 1 hour average gridded product

Data product available as NetCDF files per hour on OPeNDAP:
Non QC QC

Data product available as monthly aggregated NetCDF files on OPeNDAP:
Non QC QC

The South Australian Gulf site is composed of two radar stations:

  • Cape Spencer Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC QC
  • Cape Wiles Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC QC
dataset.title: Radar data - South Australia Gulf (non QC data)

variable.title: Standard deviation of sea water velocity U component values in 1 hour, after rejection of obvious bad data (see abstract).
Standard deviation of sea water velocity V component values in 1 hour, after rejection of obvious bad data (see abstract).
Number of observations of sea water velocity in 1 hour from station 1, after rejection of obvious bad data (see abstract).
Number of observations of sea water velocity in 1 hour from station 2, after rejection of obvious bad data (see abstract).

Data product available as monthly aggregated NetCDF files on OPeNDAP:
Non QC

Before 2012-12-15T11:00:00, the Turquoise Coast site is composed of the following two radar stations:

  • Cervantes Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC
  • SeaBird Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC

From 2012-12-15T11:00:00 to 2013-03-19T00:00:00, the Turquoise Coast site is composed of the following two radar stations:

  • Green Head Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC
  • SeaBird Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC

After 2013-03-19T00:00:00, the Turquoise Coast site is composed of the following two radar stations:

  • Green Head Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC
  • Lancelin Radial data on OPeNDAP: Non QC
dataset.title: Radar data - Turquoise Coast (non QC data)

dataset.copyrightStatement:
Monthly World CSIRO Atlas of Regional Seas (CARS) 2009

IMOS CARS2009 metadata record

Original data available as NetCDF files at:
Access

Data product available as monthly/weekly NetCDF files on OPeNDAP:
eMII-product

CARS is a digital climatology, or atlas of seasonal ocean water properties. It comprises gridded fields of mean ocean properties over the period of modern ocean measurement, and average seasonal cycles for that period. Full details can be found

here
dataset.title: CARS 2009 - World Monthly

dataset.copyrightStatement:
Weekly Australia CSIRO Atlas of Regional Seas (CARS) 2009

IMOS CARS2009 metadata record

Original data available as NetCDF files at:
Access

Data product available as monthly/weekly NetCDF files on OPeNDAP:
eMII-product

CARS is a digital climatology, or atlas of seasonal ocean water properties. It comprises gridded fields of mean ocean properties over the period of modern ocean measurement, and average seasonal cycles for that period. Full details can be found

here
dataset.title: CARS 2009 - Australia Weekly
